fields.label: Mobile Logo

fields.instructions: The logo to be used in the mobile top navigation bar.

fields.label: Service Areas
fields.name: service_areas
fields.instructions: This goes by the copyright at the bottom of the footer

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: img
sub_fields.instructions: The image that is displayed on the listing of blog posts.

sub_fields.label: Excerpt
sub_fields.name: excerpt
sub_fields.instructions: The short description on the listing of blog posts.

sub_fields.label: External Link
sub_fields.name: external_link
sub_fields.instructions: If this is not a blog post, then please post the external URL here.

fields.label: Blog Post Text
fields.name: blog_post_text
fields.instructions: If it's a blog post, this text will display in the index.

fields.label: Article Text
fields.name: article_text
fields.instructions: If it's an external article, this text will display in the index.

fields.label: Video text
fields.name: video_text
fields.instructions: If it's an external video, this text will display in the index.

fields.label: PDF Text
fields.name: pdf_text
fields.instructions: If it's a PDF file, this text will display in the index.

fields.label: Type
fields.name: post_type
fields.instructions: The type of Q & A / Information page this is
